definition: To move or shift someone or something from one place or position to another, often with the intention of rearranging or reorganizing. This term is commonly used in the context of relocating objects, furniture, or individuals within a space or transferring them to a different location. It can also refer to the act of rescheduling or changing the timing of an event or appointment.

examples.english: I will be transferred next week.

examples.german: Der Lehrer hat den Schüler versetzt.
Sie hat mich in eine andere Abteilung versetzt.
examples.english: She moved me to a different department.

examples.german: Die Firma versetzt ihre Mitarbeiter regelmäßig.
examples.english: The company transfers its employees regularly.

examples.german: Er wurde in eine höhere Position versetzt.
examples.english: He was moved to a higher position.
